DOC.brief_summary: Preliminary study rat mice indicate calanus oil reduce accumulation intra-abdominal fat . Pilot study humans show adverse effect . In present study 120 subject , male female , 20-65 year old , BMI 25-30 kg/m2 include give calanus oli 1 g twice daily versus placebo 1 year . The hypothesis calanus oil reduce intra-abdominal fat , improve glucose tolerance lipid profile .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Calanus Oli Intra-abdominal Fat , Glucose Tolerance Lipids Man
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 2530 kg/m2 age 2065 year diabetes coronary heart disease last 12 month unstable angina pectoris cancer diagnose last 5 year use lipid lower drug seafood allergy
